name: DCH Blood Spot Outcome MCADD SnCT
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the outcome of the blood spot screening for medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency.
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

concept.display: Newborn blood spot specimen received
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency screening test declined
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency screening declined, no history of being screened
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency screening declined, screened in UK (as reported by parents) with no evidence of result
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency screening declined, screened outside UK with evidence of result
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency screening declined, screened outside UK with no evidence of result
Newborn blood spot screening programme, medium chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency repeat screening with further sample required
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency screening, too young for reliable screening
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency screening, sample taken too soon after blood transfusion (less than 72 hours)
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency screening, insufficient sample
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency screening, unsuitable sample (blood quality): incorrect blood application
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency screening, unsuitable sample (blood quality): compressed/damaged
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency screening, unsuitable sample: day 0 and day 5 on same card
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency screening, unsuitable sample: NHS number missing/not accurately recorded
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency screening, unsuitable sample: date of sample missing/not accurately recorded
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency screening, unsuitable sample: date of birth not accurately matched
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency screening, unsuitable sample: expired card used
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency screening, unsuitable sample: more than 14 days in transit, too old for analysis
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency screening, unsuitable sample: damaged in transit
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency not suspected
Carrier of medium chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency gene mutation
Newborn blood spot screening programme, medium chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency not suspected and other disorders follow up required
Suspected medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency
Medium chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency not screened for or screening incomplete
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency not screened for or screening incomplete: over 1 year old, too old for screening
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency not screened for or screening incomplete, moved out of area
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency not screened for or screening incomplete, not contactable, reasonable efforts made
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency not screened for or screening incomplete, baby died
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency not screened for or screening incomplete, not required, previous valid result
